scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e-data && npm run test:e2e-containers && mocha tests/**/*.spec.js --timeout 50000; npm run test:e2e-stop-containers
scripts.test:e2e-stop-containers: docker compose --env-file ./tests/.e2e-env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.couchdb.yml -f docker-compose.postgres.yml  -f docker-compose.pgadmin.yml down -v
scripts.test:e2e-containers: docker compose --env-file ./tests/.e2e-env -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.couchdb.yml -f docker-compose.postgres.yml -f tests/dbt/docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.pgadmin.yml up -d --build --force-recreate
